website_summaries.verdict: This candy machine can hold 3 different types of candy at the same time.
pros: Dispenses the candy right into your hand to cut down on the germs from people grabbing candy from a tray
Base rotates for easy access to candy types
cons: Can come apart easily if you pick it up from the top

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but had to glue base on
customer_reviews.text: Would have given 5 stars but the cylinder that holds the candy is not secured to the base. If you tired to pick it up by the cylinder like I show in my photo then the base would pop off and ALL the candy would spill out. I can pick it up like that because I used the special plastic super glue to secure the base on. I would think they would have made it a twist on base or something. Otherwise it looks great and dispenses jelly beans, skittles, and fruit runts just fine.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Life Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: After reading previous reviews, I super-glues the container to the bottom. The dispenser works perfectly and was a big hit with all ages at a recent family gathering.
customer_reviews.author: M J Eaton

customer_reviews.title: this thing is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my office and now people stop by just to try it and the candy inside. I currently have JellyBellies, regular M&Ms and SweetTart Mini Chews in them. I tried another, slightly larger candy in it in place of one of the other ones (I forget what they were), and they tended to bind it up. One of my coworkers, trying to unbind it, turned it sideways and shook it...don't do that. The only real flaw for this is that the lid does not seal off each section, so the candies all got mixed together. Minor flaw. I paid $13 for mine, and especially for that price, this thing is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: ShirtPauly

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy and bad quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with the quality. It’s made of cheap plastic and the base does not lock in. I put almonds in one section and it dispenses several at a time but the base opens and all the almonds went everywhere. I have a very high end bar recreational area and thought this would be a nice addition- providing options. It just looks so cheap and it’s fragile. The concept is wonderful. Will look for a metal and glass version,..this item was not worth what i paid. But more importantly you have to,prepare for all the innards to come out because the base doesn’t lock in.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Broken compartment
customer_reviews.text: This is great and my 5-year-old loves it. He is obsessed with gum all machines and candy machines. There are compartments and one of the compartments broke. We put it back together but it doesn’t have a spring. We have to be careful when we want to get the candy out. If it gets hit wrong then all of the candy will fall out in the broken compartment. It holds a lot of candy.
customer_reviews.author: goht

customer_reviews.title: Huge Hit At the Office!
customer_reviews.text: If you want to be the most popular person at work, stick this baby on your desk. It's a generous size and fits a ton of candy. Please listen to the reviews and suggestions about to construction! YES, it’s clear center came a bit scuffed and cloudy. And YES, if you lift it by that same piece when full you will be swimming in candy. Superglue it together and you’ll be fine. Otherwise, I highly recommend this sweet little dispenser!
customer_reviews.author: ZaniiD

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this at work for a few days now and must say I absolutely love it! Right now its filled with whole cashews, chocolate covered raisins and m&ms. I will say, it doesnt dispense the whole cashews easily, they're a little to big, but lesson learned and I'll just get the halves from now on lol. I understand why the base isnt attached. Makes for cleaning alot easier if you can take it apart, but the container does fit pretty snugly into the base so it doesnt worry me much. I just know to pick it up from the base to avoid spillage 🤷‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: This dispenser is great..
customer_reviews.text: This dispenser is great...IF you can find enough little candies to fill it with. It really only works with small candies like skittles or m&m's. I tried putting peanuts in, and it dispenses about 2-3 at a time. If you have enough little candies, this is perfect. Otherwise, pass! The quality is nice, rotates easily and holds a good amount.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: ... was a gift for my friends children and they loved it! The only thing that I would like ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my friends children and they loved it! The only thing that I would like to change, it I could, would be that the dispenser has some stop to it... Meaning, once the latch to open and receive candy is opened, the candy "free flows" out until closed. The friends children LOVED IT, but my friend didn't because she had to stop her kids from taking so much, but it really wasn't their fault. It isn't a bad thing at all, but a design function that would be nice to improve on. Other than that, it was exactly how I thought it would be! It works fine and the kids loved it! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Sleepysnails

customer_reviews.title: Eminem’s and jellybeans the third one I put in M&Ms peanut butter and it’s
customer_reviews.text: It’s not real sturdy, however it good enough for the money. Put in Eminem’s and jellybeans the third one I put in M&Ms peanut butter that seems to be as large as you should go. Tighter fit but works
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She loved it and loves having it for her classroom as ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our 4th grade teacher as a goodbye gift this year. Heard that maybe filling/exchanging the candy will be tough. She loved it and loves having it for her classroom as a treat/incentive, but will update later once I hear back if she's having any trouble with it. Hopefully my 2nd daughter gets the same teacher this fall and can try it out herself!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Potty Training Reward Jar
customer_reviews.text: We use this as our potty training reward jar for our twin toddlers. When they successfully use the potty they get to choose one of the three candies. They live it! As far as durability this is just ok. I don't see it lasting that long because the plastic mechanisms seem a little cheap. It is also a little tough to clean if something melts in it or gets sticky. But this should last us through potty training so it should be fine enough for our purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Karate4566

customer_reviews.title: Better than the more expensive battery operated dispensers.
customer_reviews.text: I've had a couple of the battery powered dispensers for my office over the years and this is MUCH better. There are no batteries to die, and you get a handful every time. Never jams. No hygiene concerns. The three different compartments are also very nice to add different candy at the same time. Price was right. Thinking about getting another one for home.
customer_reviews.author: kjoc

customer_reviews.title: Lid doesn't even fit
customer_reviews.text: We returned this product, because the lid would not even fit on the top. What good is a candy dispenser that doesn't seal? The actual pieces from which the candy is dispensed were also ill fitted. Overall, the product is as cheap as the price suggests.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This came in pieces (and slightly broken on the bottom ...
customer_reviews.text: This came in pieces (and slightly broken on the bottom, but I tried to work with it) which I tried to re-assemble (the clear tubing was separate from the bottom, but I think it is supposed to be attached). The serving hole at the bottom is TINY - suitable for candy the size of a regular gumball or smaller, so this will not work with any larger candies (I had fruit sours) . After I went out and bought teeny tiny candy to fill each of the three compartments, I lifted it up to move it to the table, and KABOOM. Rainbow disaster. Back it went.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: For $13 it was an okay deal. I'm assuming the spots on the side are glue as I tried to wash the clear cylinder and it wouldn't come off. It looks like it should be assembled coming out of the box but this is how it came. If you're looking for an awesome deal this is not it. 😕
customer_reviews.author: Beckie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This is not a good product unless you are not going to put anything in it other than maybe tic-tacs. Almost every time I was getting some candy the holder lifted - it needs something to secure it. I was looking forward to having it set up for use, but it made a mess several times. It's a good starting concept but needs some work.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Your kids will love you for it!
customer_reviews.text: I keep it on my coffee table. My GKs love it. I enjoy buying and filling it w candy and watching them and their parents enjoy it when they visit. I put in reeses pieces, skittles sours, plain m & ms and ive put in sweet tarts. I was gunna put in peanut m&ms but sadly they didnt make it to the candy dispenser. I dispensed them into my mouth over Christmas. But this is a very nice machine! Your kids will love you for it!
customer_reviews.author: ImpurfectAngel

customer_reviews.title: Kids absolutely love this. Awesome birthday present
customer_reviews.text: Kids absolutely love this. Awesome birthday present. Has been working perfectly for months. Only pain is you can't lift it unless you pick it up from the bottom and top at the same time. "Tube" separates from base. I guess it was designed this way for easier cleaning. Love the way it turns on base. Big hit and have been using for months. Don't know why the bad reviews.... It is $12 and so fun. Doesn't take a rocket scientist. I have young kids using this.....
customer_reviews.author: Momof3

customer_reviews.title: The top isn’t securely attached to the base. After ...
customer_reviews.text: The top isn’t securely attached to the base. After we added candy and tried to move the dispenser, the top detached and candies spilled out. Forget trying to fill and then transport as a gift. You will have food all over the place
customer_reviews.author: AmazonBean

customer_reviews.title: Not durable at all!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this product. It came broken. The clear container part was not glued down to the stand so it pops off every time someone tries to get a snack out of one of the compartments. I was excited for this product so very unfortunate that it doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Hewlett

customer_reviews.title: not sturdy, candy will fall out
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I still decided to give the candy machine a try... after all what child doesnt want a 3 part candy machine dispenser? The compartments that hold the candy do not attach properly to the base which means if you pick it up (or even if you try to dispense candy) the candy spills everywhere. After 3 spills in one night, i had to trash the candy and decided to return the machine and purchase the old fashion gumball type of candy machine.
customer_reviews.author: LaShonda Horton

customer_reviews.title: Its cool.
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome, a bit flimsy. Remember to hold down the lid when dispensing or you may lift the whole clear part up. That makes a big mess. Otherwise it works great.
customer_reviews.author: I am a GeekTop Contributor: BBQ Styles

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, clean, and refill- and it's FUN!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a coworker's Christmas present, pre-filled it with assorted candies of various sizes, and she loved it! It held all of the candies and dispensed very small and quite large (peanut M&Ms) candy with no problems!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Perniciaro

customer_reviews.title: Boss Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my boss, who is an M&Ms junkie. We filled it with regular M&Ms on all three sides, and he loves it. It's easy to assemble, and is a good height for a desk. I glued the cylinder to the base to avoid a disaster if someone picked it up by the top.
customer_reviews.author: KAT

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but not built to last more than a month
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome idea but falls apart after a month. The latches to open/close the candy dispenser falls apart quickly. After that, the cylinder disconnects from the base. This means candy goes everywhere. It’s great for limited use only. I ordered a second one, and it came broken and in pieces. I recommend passing on this.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Nice dispenser, just need super glue on hand
customer_reviews.text: There’s really no instructions, so I was unsure about how to place the 3 unattached pieces. I just came to the reviews to check out some pictures. The base does not securely attached to the cylinder as many have stated, but that’s nothing a little super glue can’t help. If it wasn’t for that, I would have rated it 5 stars. I paid $20 for this, and it’s definitely worth my money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: purchased for a co-worker
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this for his employees. It works fine, just be careful how you pick it up. One of his picked it up by the top, after it was filled... There was candy everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had to give 1 star or this would have gotten 0!!! In the last 3 days I have received 2 of these & they were both broken. The 1st one, 2 of the compartments would not open (like glued shut). The 2ndi recieved today an it was broken in pieces straight out of the box!!! Waste of time and money!!
customer_reviews.author: MAM

customer_reviews.title: Seller was very easy to work with.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get these ( I ordered 2 ) for Christmas gifts. First one wouldn't dispense at all. After messing with it , one worked. Seller is replacing , very easy and fast to respond. The product doesn't fasten together , I'm a little worried about it being used and falling apart. So questioning the durability.
customer_reviews.author: RHONDA VANKIRK

customer_reviews.title: Every Grandma should have one
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for children and adults who love skittles. Very easy to operate and uses jelly bellies small nuts and a good reading chair snack dispenser
customer_reviews.author: Verna L. Hurley

customer_reviews.title: The first was defective.  Received a new one and second was defective in same way.
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old daughter gave this to her older brother for Christmas. One of the three dispensers wouldn't open. Amazon was easy to work with and sent us another. When we received the second one it had the exact same problem - only two of the three dispensers would open. We've tried to gently get it to open but it won't budge. It's plastic so if we put too much force into it, I'm pretty sure it will break.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: If you like Candy This Is a Great and Fun Candy Machine for Kids, Adults, Home or Office!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! no problems ... just got to remember to use small round candy ... like jelly belly's, m&m's plain without peanuts. has 3 different compartments so you can fill it with different kinds of candy. sturdy and well made. works great for an office or this is perfect at home if you have kids around. Great product and fun. Holds alot of candy and dispenses great!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Hall

customer_reviews.title: Love this little machines
customer_reviews.text: Love this little machines. I have bought five of them. You might want to super glue the base to the plastic candy holder base as if your grand kids try to pick it up.... The candy will fall out everywhere . Lol!
customer_reviews.author: Janice S.

customer_reviews.title: Cool concept, flawed design
customer_reviews.text: This is super cool. But the design is sort of flawed. The middle clear plastic part gets loose easily, the pieces can all come loose- making it easy for all the candy to fall out the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Jean

customer_reviews.title: Cool candy machine
customer_reviews.text: Cool candy machine. Seems to be a cheap plastic material but I only paid like $ 13. We'll see how long it lasts. Got it loaded with Reese's Pieces and I'm waiting on Amazon to ship me my M&M's.
customer_reviews.author: Joey R

customer_reviews.title: Wish the top was attached better. But love the concept
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept of the three different types of candy I can use put in this. But after I put the candy in I picked it up from the clear plastic area and all the candy fell out because it’s not secure. I put tape on it so that it doesn’t fall out Incase someone at work tries to pick it up.
customer_reviews.author: Ladiebugs

customer_reviews.title: Spilling the beans
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. When I tested the dispenser with a hand full of jelly beans it was fine. More candy was released than expected but I was okay with that. The problem encountered was when each section was about three quarters full. When you pressed the release for the candy to drop out, the cylinder itself kept pushing up. I ended up putting the jelly beans in bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: Very nice dispenser. I washed it upon arrival. However, there’s a bunch of white dots inside and on the bottom which are either paint or glue. I’m still going to try to use it but it shouldn’t look like this.
customer_reviews.author: Kia Penn

customer_reviews.title: Like the dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Like the dispenser. It is a little frail but I have had no problems. I'm sure if it had heavier use it could possibly be a problem. Only slight jamming problem I have had has been with pistachios in the shell. I switched to shelled pistachios but they go too fast! Overall I am happy with it. Great price and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This product isn’t sturdy enough to hold candy. Wish it was. My son grabbed it and m and ms went everywhere on floor.
customer_reviews.author: farrell

customer_reviews.title: We glued the lower part down and it fills easily from the top now
customer_reviews.text: We have had a few mishaps with what parts open. It opened from the top and at the bottom of the clear plastic, which was a mess. We glued the lower part down and it fills easily from the top now.
customer_reviews.author: DRS

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love this product I have a 3 year old nephew that love getting gumballs out of it. Very easy for him to use.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Stalker

customer_reviews.title: Great for an office!!!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone at work Loves it. It was a big hit!!!! The color works so well as that blue is in our company logo. Just had to sit it on top of something on the table as need room to put your hand under to get the candy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love. This is great for parties and holidays
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. I love that people don’t have to stick their hands in a candy dish they just press the lever and it dispense they candy. Great for parties and holidays
customer_reviews.author: Alisha B.

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loves it
customer_reviews.text: Everyone loves my candy dispenser! I spray painted mine so it could match my decor. The only flaw is that 30% of the candy gets stuck when you try to dispense it.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Needs help...
customer_reviews.text: As other reviews state, item was non-operational upon receiving. Two of the dispensers were glued on the inside. After carefully working them both free, one of the springs popped off and had to completely disassemble the base to fix it. Also glued the cylinder to the base as others suggested. Works great now, after a few hours of repair... kids love it and use it everyday! Worth the cheap price!
customer_reviews.author: Doni L Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight plastic
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived broken and even if it hadn't been broken I would have been disappointed. For the money I didn't expect metal and glass but this product is cheaply made of very light weight plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my office staff as a gift and it's served its purpose well! We use it for candy and nuts. Larger mixed nuts sometimes get stuck because the opening for releasing the treats is very small, which can lead to some nuts being catapulted across the room unexpectedly. Short of that, this is a solid unit that rotates and is easy to fill/clean.
customer_reviews.author: K10

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup! One 42oz of M&Ms almost filled it ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup! One 42oz of M&Ms almost filled it up. Holds plenty of candy and dispenses M&Ms easily. We have not tried any other candies in it.
customer_reviews.author: KBM

customer_reviews.title: Overall nice candy dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Great item until you try to take the lid off to fill and the entire plastic tube comes off when it’s full in two sections. Imagine the clean up.
customer_reviews.author: rubix2607

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: Spent 30 minutes to get one of the dispensers to work. Cheap plastic wasn't cut right. Filled all 3 sections and the first time I went to move it, the top came off and dumped all of the peanuts and candy on the floor. Very cheaply made. Threw it in the trash
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Gumball machine
customer_reviews.text: This is all cheap plastic, it fell apart within a week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Given as a gift and they really like it and use it every w
customer_reviews.author: Sandra T.

customer_reviews.title: cheap
customer_reviews.text: do not pay good money or this is very flimsy and hard to use falls apart and cannot get back together so cheaply made would never rebuy and I am going to throw it out
customer_reviews.author: Deborah B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Wish the dispenser allowed for slightly larger snacks but othetwise good.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Rymer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Just be careful with the top. Never carry it from the top as it doesn’t “lock” on.
customer_reviews.author: Octavia

customer_reviews.title: This item is awesome! Definitely worth the money I paid for it
customer_reviews.text: This item is awesome! Definitely worth the money I paid for it. The only complaint I have about it is that there's no way to really "stop" candy from coming out once put in the "closed" position, like an actual stopper or something like on gumball machines.
customer_reviews.author: Tom M

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but does the job
customer_reviews.text: his was not put together well as the bottom piece does not stay attached so if you lift it from the sides your candy is going everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality - don't waste your time.  I returned as soon as it was received.
customer_reviews.text: The thing wouldn't even stay together long enough for me to try it out. I'd reattach one thing and another would fall off. Obviously made in China. Don't waste your time or money on this.
customer_reviews.author: LO Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Triple Candy Dispenser - love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this and so does everyone at my office. this is so much fun - to look at, and to get candy from. Great quality - spins great and dispenses assorted candy great. Right now I have jelly beans, skittles and M&Ms filling the chambers. If you or someone you know has a sweet tooth - you need this (plus it's portion control - it's small amounts that are dispensed).
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: Fun to have
customer_reviews.text: Fun to have, works well. You will need to put a drop of super glue to prevent the cylinder from coming off and the candy spilling. It dispenses too much candy for children but good amount for adults. For kids, you could use cereal treats...a little healthier than candy. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price and rarity in finding something else like it without spending big
customer_reviews.text: This thing is not easy to clean which is slightly obvious given its size and dividers. Sometimes the candy get's mixed in with eachother, which I assume comes toward the bottom under the dividers which that also looks somewhat bad. But no big deal.. Overall not a bad product.
customer_reviews.author: Saleem Griggs-Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Candy dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use even though dispense levers come off easily.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: ... has held up fairly well considering it’s not real sturdy and my family uses it a lot
customer_reviews.text: It has held up fairly well considering it’s not real sturdy and my family uses it a lot. Jelly beans, plain m &m’s and skittles work well. Peanut/caramel m&m’s sometimes get stuck in the dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: mjv317

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for a co-worker and b.c everyone loves it.
customer_reviews.author: VRM

customer_reviews.title: It's okay but the top falls off of it a ...
customer_reviews.text: It's okay but the top falls off of it a lot. Wouldn't purchase another one but it serves it's purpose for my 5 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Randi Meshell

customer_reviews.title: Candy Dispenser glued closed
customer_reviews.text: First one 1 candy dispenser glued closed returned for a new one the second had two candy dispensers glue closed, returned did not order third one.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Really cool device
customer_reviews.text: So handy for candy - nuts - etc. Great for kids to get candy/snacks. Has 3 compartments - so can have 3 different candies or snacks. Easy to use - the candies come out easily. Easy to fill - and IT ROTATES - COOL! Would also be good for people to take to the office to keep snacks on their desk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but it is still nice. The bottom isn't secure though so watch out ...
customer_reviews.text: It is smaller than I thought it would be, but it is still nice. The bottom isn't secure though so watch out not to grab it from the top or else all your treats will come falling out. Always have to grab it by the base. I wish they had a warning about this as I had a few accidents with it. It does its function though.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this. It's so cheaply made. It's not secure. If you move it at all everything falls out. I would not recommend this to anyone that I know. definitely not for kids. If I had kept the box I'd return it.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, everything is cheap plastic. It dispensed too much candy and when you spin it, the top came off and mixed all the candy.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Schultz

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so it's kind of cheap... but that is the point. I was able to keep everyone's hand's from touching all the candy, and it's slowed down the office intake. More sanitary and saves me money. good stuff
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: ... this for many months now and it still works great at work
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for many months now and it still works great at work. I have skittles in one peanut butter M&Ms in the others and work in a good size office where ever enjoys using it. Cleaning is a bit interesting...but it works GREAT!!
customer_reviews.author: Melodie Kate Ford

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be packaged better and checked before shipping
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these that I have bought on little over a year. The one last year was blue, this year red. The red one doesn't work well at all. It was cracked and pieces kept falling off. I'm not happy with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Long

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the payment, for parties is ideal, colorful and functional. The plastic is a bit thin. the size is wide and as you have 3 cavities you can place many candies
customer_reviews.author: E. Brizuela

customer_reviews.title: Nice & convenient
customer_reviews.text: I like the product overall. It is what I was expecting. However, I was not prepared for the assembly of the product. I thought it had broken in transit. I'm not sure how long it will last with the class full of kids wanting candy but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Hate it that I eat all the candy
customer_reviews.text: Great little candy dispenser. It works like a dream and is easy to fill. My problem is now the candy is too readily available begging to be eaten.
customer_reviews.author: Charles A. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking for kids gifts. Could be a little more solid. Made with very light plastic so don't know how long they will be working. Easy to fall. I might use velcro at the bottom to avoid them falling on the floor. But after all, good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: Faulty dispenser
customer_reviews.text: ordered this candy machine as a gift for my mother's 90 th birthday. so disappointed that 2 of the push down down dispenser tabs wouldnt work. Aren't these things checked before we receive them? will not recommend buying. Will return.
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: works great for a desk top machine for the office
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for! works great for a desk top machine for the office. Works pretty well with most candies, haven't found one that didn't work with this machine. The Candy does come out quick to do be careful with that. =)
customer_reviews.author: GamerGuy33

customer_reviews.title: Great For the Sweet Stuff
customer_reviews.text: It helps reduce your intake and allows 3 different (M&M P-nuts, Jelly Belly's and M&M Choc.)
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart on first use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product as a birthday gift for my grandson. The first time he tried to move it, the candy dispenser came apart and all the candies fell out and combined to make one big mess! I wouldn't recommend this product to anyone and have already thrown it away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this 3-Way Candy Dispenser
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this 3-way candy dispenser. They love that they can have 3 different kids of candy that they can choose from. It also looks very colorful and pretty on my kitchen counter. By this your will not be dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Cherry Fischer

customer_reviews.title: The candy dispenser is a joke!!!
customer_reviews.text: Liked nothing about this item. Plastic was cheaply made. Plastic guides to put it together all out of line and the candy will not dispense properly. It was $21.00 way to much for this cheaply made product!!
customer_reviews.author: Enrique

customer_reviews.title: I shouldn't have ignored the reviews.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a gift. The day after Christmas, I received a call from the recipient saying one of the dispensers was broken when he pulled it out of the box. Now I have to go through the hassle of returning. :(
customer_reviews.author: lisa sandy

customer_reviews.title: But wished it could do slightly larger candies too like almond m&ms and Mike n ikes
customer_reviews.text: Works well for skittles and regular m&ms. But wished it could do slightly larger candies too like almond m&ms and Mike n ikes.
customer_reviews.author: Leesa Jones

customer_reviews.title: Defective handles
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered 5 of these dispensers. Three of the five had dispenser handles that were stuck and unusable. The insides of the dispensers were filmy and parts of the outside were scratched. Will not be reordering this product.
customer_reviews.author: Roofus

customer_reviews.title: Dispenser Not Handy
customer_reviews.text: The dispenser fell apart after I filled it with candy. This was not a good buy. Can't return since it is after the 60 day return date. I did't use it until I return to my classroom to hand out treats to my students.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glue base to turntable
customer_reviews.text: Necessary to glue base to turntable so if it is accidentally picked up by the base all of the candy will not spill out
customer_reviews.author: Luxi653

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Makes for a great gift for someone who loves candy. It would be great if it was sold with some candy to add to it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Ronit S.

customer_reviews.title: Device good but...
customer_reviews.text: The candy holder is fine but the problem is that if there is a strong flavor candy in one section, it affects the flavor of the others so we just put one type of candy. I should have bought just the one for one candy.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: broken when we got it and looks used, it spills all the candies on the floor
customer_reviews.author: Santos’ Review

customer_reviews.title: Junk! Arrived broken in 2 spots and isn't even worth fixing
customer_reviews.text: Junk! Arrived broken in 2 spots and isn't even worth fixing! should of figured as much, from other reviews. This is absolute junk! Great concept, but very poor quality!
customer_reviews.author: Sare Bear

customer_reviews.title: but I absoutely love the machine itself
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I found the exact same thing for $8.95 after I purchased this one from you for $12. but I absoutely love the machine itself. I will maybe look a little further before buying things from now on, but I have no other complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: arrietty

customer_reviews.title: Triple Candy Machine
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. It was a gift for my brother and was shipped to CA. It was not completely functional. I have ordered 3 of the exact Jobar Internationl triple candy machines from a different mailing company without problems. The plastic cylinder candy compartment was loose, and 2 of the 3 round dispenser parts were loose. Will not order this machine from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dispensers don't open
customer_reviews.text: Its the perfect size if it worked. Only one of the three dispensers open.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ackerson

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay together very well
customer_reviews.text: Does not stay together very well. After we filled it we picked it up to move it and it came apart sending the candy everywhere. We ended up taping the base to the cylinder.
customer_reviews.author: crosscorner

customer_reviews.title: Cute but cheap
customer_reviews.text: It’s a fun gift but looks cheap and falls apart easily. If I were to buy something like this I’d invest in a glass and metal one, not plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Indiana Volby

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Giving these as Christmas gifts so hope they are well received. Well they do not work well Went to put candy in them and they came apart. What a mess. will never purchase anything from you again
customer_reviews.author: Karen K. Childs

product_meta.title: Handy Gourmet Cand Candy Dispenser, 5.75 x 12.00 x 5.75, Red
product_meta.description: Color:RedEnjoy your favorite snacks at your convenience With the triple candy machine. Choose up to 3 different snacks to fill up the 3 available compartments. The base’s 360 spin capabilities allows easy access to each snack compartment. Whether its jelly beans, gum balls, Peanuts, or other tiny snacks, simply remove the top lid for easy filling. The fingertip dispenser provides easy distribution of your snacks.
feature_bullets: TRIPLE THE SNACKS: Store & dispense not one, but up to three different snacks with the candy machine’s 3 compartments
360 DEGREE SELECTION: The base can spin 360 degrees for easy snack selection
EASY-TO-USE: Remove the lid for easy filling. Use the fingertip dispenser for easy snack distribution
IDEAL USE: Great for jelly beans, peanuts, gumballs, and other small snacks

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars832 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
